articles.title: Europe’s Space Program Plays Catch-Up With China and India - Caixin Global
articles.description: As the Asian giants head to the moon, France, Germany and Italy have committed 340 million euros per year to the European Space Agency’s Ariane 6 rocket program, set for its first launch next year
articles.content: (Nikkei Asia) Europes intention to launch a return cargo mission to the International Space Station by 2028 puts it years behind China and India, with industry experts saying that unless there is gre… [+431 chars]
